edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.denoise

Class Denoise

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.util.props.ConfigurableAdapter
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.BaseDataProcessor
        • edu.cmu.sphinx.frontend.denoise.Denoise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataProcessor, Configurable

    public class Denoise
extends BaseDataProcessor
    The noise filter, same as implemented in sphinxbase/sphinxtrain/pocketsphinx. Noise removal algorithm is inspired by the following papers Computationally Efficient Speech Enchancement by Spectral Minina Tracking by G. Doblinger Power-Normalized Cepstral Coefficients (PNCC) for Robust Speech Recognition by C. Kim. For the recent research and state of art see papers about IMRCA and A Minimum-Mean-Square-Error Noise Reduction Algorithm On Mel-Frequency Cepstra For Robust Speech Recognition by Dong Yu and others
